title: block sans - Service
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120312002039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/service_4830.jpg)

I cannot seem to find a match to this - anyone?
author: evan

comments.content: could be AF (acme fonts) carplates. only link i was able to find fast was [fontshop.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20120312002039/http:/www.fontshop.de/sukr.php3?ch=%2Ffontproductdetailc.php3%3Fns%3D1%26sns%3D13%26ns%3D1%26sns%3D13%26co%3DFont-Sampler%26id%3D6026645) which isnt the most userfriendly site on the net.. but should work.

Probably 'Alpha Headline', by Cornel Windlin, still _( 2012 )_ a Mitsubishi exlusive.

[Dav](http://web.archive.org/web/20120312002039/http:/www.dav.name/)

Nah, ' [Mandatory](http://web.archive.org/web/20120312002039/http:/www.k-type.com/fontmand.html)', by Keith Bates.  
_( Based on the UK license plates 'typeface'. )_

[Dav](http://web.archive.org/web/20120312002039/http:/www.dav.name/)
oh well, at least i was right about the license platesâ€¦ :)

The [official mandatory](http://web.archive.org/web/20120312002039/http:/www.opsi.gov.uk/si/si2001/20010561.htm#sch4) UK license plate font is [Charles Wright](http://web.archive.org/web/20120312002039/http:/www.charles-wright.com/more.html)
